trans-unit.source: Defines the properties and methods shared between data-store tables and data-store views.
trans-unit.target: 定義屬性和方法資料存放區資料表和資料存放區檢視表之間共用。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataTableBase class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataTableBase 類別是代表在設計階段資料存放區的結構描述的許多型別之一。

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這些結構描述項目所實作的設計工具可提供給控制項<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 控制將結構描述物件存取藉由呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>介面方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataTableBase class provides the properties and methods shared between data tables in a data store and views defined on those data tables.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataTableBase 類別提供的屬性和方法資料存放區中的資料表與這些資料表上定義檢視表之間共用。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the DesignerDataTableBase class, you must override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自 DesignerDataTableBase 類別時，您必須覆寫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化類別的繼承的類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the table or view.
trans-unit.target: 資料表或檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化類別的繼承的類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the table or view.
trans-unit.target: 資料表或檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The data-store owner of the table or view.
trans-unit.target: 資料表或檢視的資料存放區擁有者。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of columns defined for a table or view.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料表或檢視表定義的資料行集合。

trans-unit.source: The Columns property is populated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A> method the first time the Columns property is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 資料行屬性會填入<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A>方法第一次存取屬性資料行時。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection of columns defined for a table or view.
trans-unit.target: 資料表或檢視表定義的資料行集合。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection of data-store column objects.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回資料存放區資料行物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The CreateColumns method is called the first time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.Columns%2A> property is accessed, to populate the collection of data-store columns.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫 CreateColumns 方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.Columns%2A>存取屬性，以填入資料存放區資料行的集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data-store table or view.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料存放區資料表或檢視表的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data-store table or view.
trans-unit.target: 資料存放區資料表或檢視表名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the owner of the data-store table or view.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料存放區資料表或檢視表的擁有者。

trans-unit.source: The owner of the data-store table or view.
trans-unit.target: 資料存放區資料表或檢視表的擁有者。
